title: Engineering a molecular electrocatalytic system for energy-efficient ammonia production from wastewater nitrate
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01727G, Paper
Dean Mackenzie Miller, Matthew Junjie Liu, Kristen Nicole Abels, Kindle Shea Williams, Anna Kogler, William Tarpeh
Anthropogenic ammonia production has sustained exponential population growth but exacerbated wastewater nitrate pollution. Abundant nitrate could be refined to purified nitrogenous chemicals with the electrochemical nitrate reduction reaction (NO3RR). However,...
